TopicTitle: Crafts Turned into Debris then Disappear.

Articles.Content: I am posting this here because I cannot pin down the bug. I'm testing 1,1 against x64 loads beyond the x86 memory limit to see if I can make it crack, but I noticed a bug that isn't a 1.1 bug and is related to mods. If you have a craft in the water, you launch a new craft, the craft becomes debris and is removed as you approach within 2km. The only plugins I have installed is, scatterer, firespitter that came with RoverDude's update to MKS, RoverDude's USI stuff and Module Manager.
